WRITING.TITLE: The struggle
WRITING.TEXT: This game lately is making me so angry i just can't anymore. I play well it's just that i have unbelievably bad luck. I completely dominate an oponent who just plays like an absolute dick and he has me at fucking 4-1. Courtois, Handanovic and TOTY Neuer haven't done jack shit in goal in the past few weeks. I have tried playing with different teams and nothing works. I just can't keep seeing my team lose anymore. I still win sometimes. But this season i am at 1-1-6. The win i got after playing two games in seasons and it seemed like it might get better as i destroyed my oponent completely outskilling him with a 4-0 at the break (ragequit after). But, no, it's not better. In fact it's worse now. The game really seems to hate me and i can feel that every single second and with every touch and every moment. It just doesn't matter how good i play. I've been stuck in div5 for what feels like ages barely managing to stay in. I am past literally crying as the game has taken away my most enjoyable way of relaxation. I love the game, i really do. I just wish it didn't hate me. Any thoughts? Has anything like this ever happened to you? What should i do? TLDR: currently struggling to play this game. insane bad luck. heeeeelp please.

i actually use 2 teams + one vatiation of the first: http://www.futhead.com/15/squads/19590380/ -goes up to 100 chem with bpl argentinian manager http://www.futhead.com/15/squads/19590869/ -same 100 chem here http://www.futhead.com/15/squads/19591916/ -100 chem with bpl italian manager

I am quite good with wingers. I often manage to cut in really well and score some beautiful goals, which is why i got reus and cuadrado even though it's harder to get the team to 100 chem. I will change teams soon but the thing is that it doesn't feel like it's the teams. I might try your suggestions and see what they do. Thanks

I'm thinking of building this team. It goes to 100 chem with the bpl argentinian manager. I have reus and aguero as untradables so i would like to keep them in, but if you have any suggestions of what would make this side better, please tell me. http://www.futhead.com/15/squads/19621049/

The problem is, Aguero is mainly the only striker I like, apart from Tevez whom I don't really know how to fit in this squad. I'm not sure why. I tried Lewandowski and I just couldn't score with him. Plus it would be kind of a waste to just have Aguero and not use him since I can't sell him. Anyway, I'm curious, what is the most fun formation you have played with? I thought I could experiment a little

I understand now, thanks. I might try that formation at some point. Thanks for all the support. I want you to know that I eventually got relegated to div 6 and then won the title no losses. Currently in div 5 1-0-1 record. I have no idea what happened but I hope it's over

WRITING.TITLE: TOTY Neuer on PC crisis
WRITING.TEXT: I know there aren't a lot of people who have him, but if you do and are looking to seel then you should know something: I waited to sell him in order to get more money. Two weeks ago he went for 3.5kk. I just saw one for 2.3kk and I just have to ask WTF? Something must be seriously wrong with those who are trying to sell him. I've been watching and everytime someone puts him on the market they drop the price by 100k-200k and the next one does the same. Do you want to lose money? Will he ever go up if you continue like this? Please just please let's all put him up for at least 3kk. He is worth that money and he is rotting on my transfer list because I'm not losing 1kk and neither should you
The question is will that ever happen? If so, then how long do I have to wait?

IF Benatia and IF Hummels are good enough to be used with toty neuer in my opinion. That being said, if he linked with other toty cb's he would be worth more. Also, I am not waiting until TOTS. I want to sell him now, but I'm not sure if his price will rise or drop in the next few days.
What about TOTY Lahm, though. He's going through a similar thing and he is still dropping. Any ideas?
Thanks. I guess I'll just take what I can get. It's still a fuckton of money. This will all be very valuable knowledge next year, though.

WRITING.TITLE: Spencer is just...likable
WRITING.TEXT: So, a couple of weeks ago i started noticing how the community seems quite fond of this guy SpencerFC. Naturally, i started watching his videos and I found them very very enjoyable and here is why: 1. He doesn't buy/promote coins. Now, I'm not against buying/promoting coins, but the general public is either strongly against it, or has no problem with it. Nobody is going to give you hate if you don't buy/promote, but they might if you do. Also, he's not strongly against buying/promoting either. He just ignores it and I think this makes both EA and the fans like him. 2. He's good at the game. Currently in his wheel of fortune series he is in division one. He is, compared to other youtubers, quite good at what he does, considering that he's not using a full legend team or even a dream squad. 3. He produces high quality content. His videos are straight forward, focused on the game and simply entertaining. His commentary isn't particularly outstanding, but it does make for a very pleasant experience for the viewer. When you watch his videos, you get what you come for. He doesn't just scream or bend over backwards for views. So, in conclusion, SpencerFC is in my opinion, after an objective analysis, one of the best fifa youtubers out there, which is why many people like him. What do you think about him? Also, what other fifa youtubers with great road to glory series do you watch?
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWkr08nsQ9GuFvHgQYafi_w
Just checked him out. He's really good at the game. I also like the fact that he adds the commentary afterwards
i see what you did there
I think so, too. I just thought I'd give my view as to why we tend to do that.
Names of scouted players in Career Mode are now more reflective of their country of origin. maybe #changecareermode actually worked

Hopefully they do that as well. But i don't think they did just yet so we shall see. If they don't I think this whole change might not be for the best, but who knows. If they do it's just a higher chance that this will all make the game better

You're not completely wrong. But people say players will mostly go for the highest possible price, or at least close to that, as people look to get he most out of their players. Now that they can't buy coins, they will all look to sell at high prices. I honestly don't know what to think about all of this. I really hope it's a good change. But people just seem to flip out without even giving it a try.

Of course that will also happen. I'm just hoping these two mentalities will cancel each other out and prices will be somewhere in the middle for most players leaving room for trading or something. We just have to wait and see.

I was watching kuroshitsuji the other day and one character sang "London bridge is falling down". It kinda caught my attention and I wanted to make some alterations to the lyrics. For instance the song went: " Tetsu to hagane de tsukure, tsukure, tsukure. Tetsu to hagane de tsukure, My Fair Lady Tetsu to hagane ja magaru, magaru, magaru. Tetsu to hagane ja magaru, My Fair Lady" to mean "Build it up with iron and steel, Iron and steel, iron and steel, Build it up with iron and steel, My fair lady. Iron and steel will bend and bow, Bend and bow, bend and bow, Iron and steel will bend and bow, My fair lady." I'd very much appreciate if someone could help me translate these to japanese (or give me some alternative that respects the model i gave above): "Build it up with love and trust, Love and trust, love and trust, Build it up with love and trust, My fair lady. Love and trust will be immortal, Be immortal, be immortal, Love and trust will be immortal, My fair lady."

So, I bought Fifa15 and the game ran smoothly all year long with no problems, even being able to play it in window mode with hardly any lag. However, the with Fifa16 demo I'm experiencing quite a bit of lag. It's still playable, but frustrating and I was wondering if there was a way to make it run like Fifa15. I've already set the fps limit to 30. Also, i went to the control panel of my graphics card and changed the 3D and battery settings to performance and the lag is still there. tldr; demo lags even though 15 runs perfectly, tried some things which didn't do much. help This is what I'm working with http://i.imgur.com/MhUUQKk.png

Try calling the second player and passing to him. If he has four/five star skills and you feel confident that you can cut in with skills then do that, otherwise if possible try a driven pass to the edge of the box (after passing to the 2nd player) and take a shot/pass in the box. Or, just cross with 2/3 bars of power and hope for the best
Yeah, try living in Romania. A dollar is around 4 RON, so it would get to about 300 RON for 12 000 fifa points. Imagine paying $300 for that shit...

Not for them, it isn't. Consumables are basically pack fillers. They make sure your packs don't give you only players (unless it's a players only pack) so that your chance of getting a good pull is smaller. 3 rares in a basic 7.5k pack does not guarantee 3 rare players, which means that you need to open more packs to get good players which means you need FIFA points, resulting in more money for EA $port$. EDIT: That being said, I personally like the concept of having to manage my team with consumables and it's only a problem in the beginning of the game. Still, I would say that there should be less consumables (or at least they should count club items, if not all consumables, separately and sell them in separate packs or something along those lines).

If it doesn't work for you, try contacting EA. I saw multiple posts regarding this in FIFA15 and some people actually got packs or coins as compensation for it. Not sure if they got their catalogue fixed, though.
Don't have the game yet, but thanks to the web-app, this baby is waiting for me http://www.futhead.com/16/squads/932473/

I've seen people say he was saying Marvin, but the language table only recognises improper nouns (like Bell, Pall or Tiara), which is why 'Marvin' triggers the error 'Not In Table'

It's the first page of the manga, aka Page 1.... In case you're not caught up, Sanji just fought a character named "Page One", but we're not actually shown the fight
Very little known fact: Luffy actually met multiple Shanks before beginning his journey, not just that one Shank :)

I'll answer from a non-american perspective because it may be useful. You'll still have to wait for someone from the U.S. to get a more complete version. Basically, while afro-americans were slaves they suffered horrible abuse because of their status. We're talking rape, murder, beatings, torture, having your children sold off as slaves, etc. That word was used to refer to them, as you would refer to that thing you sit on in front of your table using the word "chair". I think that, in addition to the emotional weight of the word, having a huge stigma on it prevents society from normalizing treating afro-americans (or anybody for that matter) as less than human again (as well as fighting against the tendency to do so, at least in theory). I hope it's not too inaccurate and it helps at least a little.
Harry Potter
I've started doing stand-up comedy. Open mics and stuff. I've recently had my first show with 3 other colleagues. I'm really loving it and hoping it works out. Any advice?

I think I can argue why that makes sense still (at least a little). Of course, there is a limited number of marines who can use haki. Since the marines are having tons of trouble with haki-using individuals in the New World, but not many of them are to be found in the Paradise section, it would make sense to send almost every haki user in the marines in the New World. They may be drawn like random grunts, and they might not even be all that strong, only able to use haki. To my knowledge, it doesn't say anywhere that you have to be extremely strong to use some armament haki (and this makes some sense, since we know someone's haki can be weaker or stronger). If you look at haki as a skill (a very useful one that does make you stronger, but still a skill not a super-ultra special ability), it starts making more sense.

Normal ca toata lumea vrea pensii mai mari. Problema e ca daca dau o astfel de masura si dupa are altcineva majoritate in parlament si o desface ca sa nu suportam consecintele, poate PSD sa arate cu degetul opozitia ca ei au scazut iar pensiile si ca doar PSD le creste.

Damn it was good. I'm really hopeful, especially with regards to the filler strategy. They have tons of stuff to expand upon since we are going rather fast in the manga and a lot of things (such as zoro's encounter with the slasher) are being left out. Developing the world by focusing attention to smaller details that can still provide interesting scenes and even some action is the proper way to handle fillers. I, for one, am very thankful to the new director for giving me hope for the anime and I truly hope they manage to keep up the amazing work.

I have consistently invested in creating healthier habbits and giving up on unhealthier ones (e.g. staying away from gaming completely for a while; currently doing it moderately and getting bored quickly). Generally doing work that I find important or fulfilling is another contributing factor. Completing tasks when I receive them and rarely postponing small tasks that don't require very specific contexts (e.g. I no longer pospone making calls or editing spreadsheets, etc.). Not interrupting working mood. I used to stop working as soon as I got the chance. Now when I contextually do some work ( e.g. when I go to a class at University) I take it as an opportunity to keep working. Breaks are fine but they shouldn't be too long and should only be taken when necessary.

WRITING.TITLE: What most people post here are not theories, they are usually hypotheses
WRITING.TEXT: I love everyone's enthusiasm and the fact that many people are active in this community, but in the interest of accuracy, you should know that theories need (usually pretty substantial) proof to be considered 'theories'. The admittedly awesome things most people post here tend to have little to no evidence, thus not technically qualifying as 'theories', but rather hypotheses and I believe that we should start calling them by their name. Maybe a flair can be added, i don't know...

NAH He is a bit of an asshole for saying you don't understand because you're a girl, but that is not the issue you are focused on now. Fantasizing about random people is completely normal and as long as you never actually get the desire to cheat you're safe. However, being open about it with your partner is a difficult (although important and mature) step and I totally understand his frustration. He might be feeling like he's not enough for you and you fantasize because you're dissatisfied with him/ the relationship/ the sex, even though it's not likely the case. Still, you should be aware of these feelings, take them into account and thread lightly in the next discussion about it, making him realize that it's only natural and harmless, having nothing to do with his quality as a boyfriend.
Well I am screaming an unnecessarily long happy birthday message to an old friend then...

Yes, I agree, but I see a lot of posts here that fall into exactly that category: great ideas, but they provide little to no evidence and require further investigation (which I believe would be encouraged by a "hypothesis" flair)

NTA, but please start looking for a job that treats you better. I'm not saying quit this one right away, I'm sure you need the money. Still, take the opportunity now that you don't NEED to be hired to look for a better job, as this gives you the chance to have higher standards.
